ProductInfo.Features:
32 CH real time recording. Standard H.264 mai profile compression to provide high-quality video at much lower bite rate than MPEG4 - Hardware compression to free CUP resource.  - Powerful H.264 SOC technics and low power consumption chip, a guarantee of robustness of system
Powerful smart phone surveillance supporting WinCE, Symbian, and Iphone. Compatible with 3G. - Recording Mode: manual, timer, motion, sensor - Search video by time or recording mode. - Multi channel zoomlocal zoom, picture capturearchiveprintbackup
Remote access and control via IE or CMS: preview, playback, PTZ, backup - DDNS, DHCP, PPoE - Dual stream technology to encode recording stream and network stream separately. User can adjust network stream to fit bandwidth, without changing recording quality;Auto reboot to avoid PC failure- Auto email triggered by alarm - E-map and smart phone(symbianWinCEIphone)
32 CH video; 32 CH audio ;Display fps Per Channel: : 10 fps@D1 (704x480); Recording fps Per Channel: 30 fps@CIF (352x240), 30 fps@DCIF (528x384) ;Intel Dual Core 2.6GHz CPU, 2TB HDD, 2GB RAM, DVD R/W, Win7 Installed, K/P & Mouse, Monitor is NOT included.
One year manufacture Warranty , and lifetime Tech-Support (If you have any problem with this product, please click "contact seller " and send email to us, we will arrange our technician Support you)
